questions.question: Rashad's head hung in defeat as he walked off the field. He slumped down on the bench and looked up at scoreboard.

choices.answer: I can infer that he injured.
I can infer that he is excited.
I can infer that he lost.
I can infer that he scored.

questions.question: Carla jumped up and down and kept looking at the clock. She had a huge smile on her face. What can you infer?

choices.answer: She is excited.
She is nervous.
She is at home.
She is at work.

questions.question: Chloe's palms sweat as she tapped her pencil on her desk. She silenced her phone and put it away. This was it. Predict:

choices.answer: She is about to go for a run.
She is about to go to the mall.
She is about to present on Google Classroom.
She is about to take a test.

questions.question: Smoke billowed out from the oven, filling the kitchen and setting off the smoke detector. Infer.

choices.answer: The oven is broken.
The food is ready to eat.
Something is burning.
The fire truck was on its way.

questions.question: Penelope jumped from counter to counter and knocked all of Sarah's pens onto the floor. She gracefully stretched.

choices.answer: I can infer Penelope is a fish.
I can infer Penelope is a cat.
I can infer Penelope is a dog.
I can infer Penelope is a parrot.

questions.question: Shelby rolled her eyes as Crystal walked into the door. She scoffed as Crystal sat down. What can you infer?

choices.answer: They are best friends forever.
They hate sitting.
Shelby smells bad.
They are in a fight.

questions.question: Ellis readied himself at the top of the ladder. He stretched his toes & peered at the water below. He took a deep breath

choices.answer: I predict Ellis is going to dive off a diving board.
I predict Ellis will fail.
I predict Ellis is going to hurt himself.
I predict Ellis is going to get a sandwich.

questions.question: Haley fidgeted on the thin paper as she waited. The smell of rubbing alcohol and cleaning solution was in the air.

choices.answer: She is getting a haircut.
She is at school.
She is in a dance competition.
She is at the doctor.

questions.question: Haley tensed up as the doctor entered the room. He hiked up her sleeve and rubbed a cleaning pad on her upper arm.

choices.answer: I predict Haley has the flu.
I predict Haley will get her eyes checked.
I predict Haley will get a shot.
I predict Haley will get a lollipop.

questions.question: Lights in the house flickered as Bernard ran around looking for a flashlight. Wind howled outside as rain pelted windows

choices.answer: He's experiencing a storm
He's playing flashlight tag
He likes to run in his house
It's sunny out
